name: wanderer
description: Wanderer is a self-hosted feed and content reader that aggregates blog posts, newsletters, and articles into one place with a calm, focused reading interface.

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Enjoy distraction-free reading with clean typography and customizable themes for comfortable viewing

features.title: Content Filtering
features.description: Set up rules to filter or prioritize content based on keywords, sources, or publication dates

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Download articles for offline access when traveling or in areas without internet connectivity

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific articles or topics quickly with full-text search across all saved content

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your reading list from any device with a responsive design that adapts to screen
